overview: After pushing the app Cloud Bots to the App Store and Google Play Store, Safir Monroe assembles a team to create a game company. Later on, a former colleague named Cody Walker experiments with COVID-19 and advances the virus to turn everyone in the world into zombies. Safir Monroe is faced with two hard decisions, continue to push his game startup to success or save the world from destruction.
title: Coronapocalypse
